name: Deepak Arora
tagline: In quest of assignments in Software Development with an organisation of high repute.
body:
Currently working as Software Engineer (Senior Executive) with HT Media. from November 2012, Experience 3.4 Years.
A focussed B.E. (Information Technology) individual with keen interest in subjects such as Software Engineering, Data Structure & Networking.
Creating a JavaScript Utility Library (bluejson) and contribute to Open Source in JavaScript Library Development
Acquired sound knowledge of Software Languages, Operating Systems, SQL Server, MySQL, MongoDB, Nagios, RRD, SNMP and Internet Applications.
Undertaken a Certificate in Developing Enterprise Applications using .Net Framework and XML from NIIT AJMER in year 2007.
Successfully attended industrial trainings at ‘Bharat Sanchar Nigam Limited, Ajmer’ on ‘Telecommunication Technology’ and at ‘NIIT’ on ‘ASP.Net and AJAX’.
Software Engineer with strong analytical, problem solving & organisational abilities.
Effective communicator with good interpersonal skills.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
